snippet.title: Against The Moon — Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Against The Moon is a tactical deckbuilder with roguelike elements and endless ways to customize your strategy. The world is in ruins, resources are scarce, and the remnants of humanity stand on the verge of extinction. Players must unite a group of legendary champions, the last hope of mankind, to challenge the tyranny of the Moon.

Website: https://againstmoon.com/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/againstmoongame 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Against-The-Moon-107892290555942/
